psalm.title: Psalms

first_reading.text:
[[Nb 6,22]]The LORD said to Moses :
[[Nb 6,23]]"Speak to Aaron and his sons and tell them: This is how you shall bless the Israelites. Say to them:
[[Nb 6,24]]The LORD bless you and keep you!
[[Nb 6,25]]The LORD let his face shine upon you, and be gracious to you!
[[Nb 6,26]]The LORD look upon you kindly and give you peace!
[[Nb 6,27]]So shall they invoke my name upon the Israelites, and I will bless them."
first_reading.title: Book of Numbers

second_reading.text:
[[Ga 4,4]]Brothers and sisters: When the fullness of time had come, God sent his Son, born of a woman, born under the law,
[[Ga 4,5]]to ransom those under the law, so that we might receive adoption.
[[Ga 4,6]]As proof that you are children, God sent the spirit of his Son into our hearts, crying out, "Abba, Father!"
[[Ga 4,7]]So you are no longer a slave but a child, and if a child then also an heir, through God.
second_reading.title: Letter to the Galatians

gospel.text:
[[Lc 2,16]]The shepherds went in haste to Bethlehem and found Mary and Joseph, and the infant lying in the manger.
[[Lc 2,17]]When they saw this, they made known the message that had been told them about this child.
[[Lc 2,18]]All who heard it were amazed by what had been told them by the shepherds.
[[Lc 2,19]]And Mary kept all these things, reflecting on them in her heart.
[[Lc 2,20]]Then the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all they had heard and seen, just as it had been told to them.
[[Lc 2,21]]When eight days were completed for his circumcision, he was named Jesus, the name given him by the angel before he was conceived in the womb.
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
